name: Glenosoft Pte Ltd
description: Glenosoft Pte Ltd is a technology solutions provider based in Singapore. They offer professional services to businesses and organizations in the region. The company was founded in 2012 and has been operating for over 11 years. Glenosoft provides a range of services, including e-commerce application development. They are an exempt private limited company with three officers12. Unfortunately, I do not have any more information about their services or products.
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline:
We serve big and small companies.
 We deliver and complete project on schedule.
ShortDescription: Our company has been developing high-quality and reliable software for corporate needs since 2012. We are renowned professionals of software development.
enhanced_description: Glenosoft Pte Ltd, established in Singapore in 2012, is an experienced technology solutions provider specializing in professional services and custom software development for corporate needs. With over 11 years in operation, they offer a range of services including e-commerce application development, eCatalog Backend Systems, Profile Assessment Systems for companies, and Custom Web Application Development. While serving both large and small companies, their offerings specifically address HR technology needs in recruiting, pre-employment screening, and background checks, aiming to help businesses reduce hiring costs by delivering high-quality and reliable software on schedule.
key_use_cases: Developing custom web applications for corporate needs
Assessing candidate profiles for pre-employment screening
competitive_advantages: Proven track record of delivering projects on schedule
Development of high-quality and reliable software
Expertise as renowned professionals in software development
Over 11 years of experience in technology solutions
roi_benefits: Optimization of sourcing expenditures for talent acquisition
